fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Outlines commitment to preventing and addressing gender-based violence, aligned with WIETA/SIZA standards.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all employees, contractors, suppliers, and stakeholders in the workplace and supply chain.

fields.label: Zero-Tolerance Policy
options: No form of gender-based violence is tolerated
Prompt and decisive action taken against perpetrators

fields.label: WIETA/SIZA Compliance
options: No harassment or violence permitted in workplace/supply chain
Compliance with ethical labor and human rights standards

fields.label: Prevention and Awareness
options: Mandatory training for employees and contractors
Education on legal rights and support access

fields.label: Reporting and Support
options: Access to counseling and external support services

fields.label: Investigations and Disciplinary Measures
options: Disciplinary actions including termination or legal action
Cooperation with authorities where criminal conduct occurs

fields.label: Roles and Responsibilities
options: HR supports victims and manages procedures
Employees report incidents and attend training

fields.label: Consequences of Non-Compliance
fields.description: Violators face disciplinary action up to termination and potential legal consequences.
